column4: im trying to use serpentine belt for my music burner and its telling me it need gstreamer plugins... im pretty sure i got them all but i might be missing some, which ones do i need exactly to burn mp3's
im not! im trying to find a solution
well, ask an actual question, then. Don't just randomly hit the bot
already have, figured no one could help
what are you trying to do? Burn mp3s onto audio CDs?

yes, using the serpentine burner software... once i try to add the mp3 files it tells me i need the gstreamer plugins which i found with apt-cache and installed, but im not sure exactly which gstreamer packages i need, as i said before
then you should be able to use them in Serp
but i cant, hence my question
actually, the problem is probably that Serpentine is using the older gstreamer version
search for gstreamer again, install the 0.8 versions as well as the 0.10 versions - the two can co-exist
there are a number of ops present - what's the problem?
